PROJECT_DASHBOARD.description: The Dashboard tab, used to send signals from a board.

DASHBOARD_VIEWER_INVALID_SIGNAL.description: Warning that shows up when the signal name entered by the user is not correct.

DASHBOARD_VIEWER_MOVE_LEFT.description: Button used to move a graph to the left

DASHBOARD_VIEWER_MOVE_RIGHT.description: Button used to move a graph to the right

DASHBOARD_VIEWER_GRAPH_SETTINGS.description: Button that opens a prompt where the user can modify the graph's properties

DASHBOARD_VIEWER_ERASE_GRAPH.description: Button used to delete a graph

DASHBOARD_SIGNAL_NAME.description: Input text area for the name of the signal

DASHBOARD_SIGNAL_DESCRIPTION.description: Input text area for additional description of the signal

DASHBOARD_SIGNAL_COLOR.description: Button used to pick the color of the signal

DASHBOARD_ADD_SIGNAL.description: Button used to add a signal graph

DASHBOARD_LOW_COLOR.description: Button used to pick the color of the signal

DASHBOARD_LOW_VALUE.description: Button used to pick the color of the signal

DASHBOARD_MID_COLOR.description: Button used to pick the color of the signal

DASHBOARD_MID_VALUE.description: Button used to pick the color of the signal

DASHBOARD_HIGH_COLOR.description: Button used to pick the color of the signal

DASHBOARD_MIN_AXES_VALUE.description: Input text area foar the minimum value of an axis

DASHBOARD_MAX_AXES_VALUE.description: Input text area foar the maximum value of an axis

DASHBOARD_KILOMETERS.description: Unit of measure for speedometer and gauge

DASHBOARD_MILES.description: Unit of measure for speedometer and gauge

DASHBOARD_MIN_VALUE.description: Input text area foar the minimum value of an axis

DASHBOARD_MAX_VALUE.description: Input text area foar the maximum value of an axis

DASHBOARD_DELETE_TITLE.description: Title of confirmation prompt when the user tries to delete a signal

DASHBOARD_DELETE_QUESTION.message: Are you sure you want to delete this signal?

DASHBOARD_NO_TITLE.message: Please choose a name for the signal.
DASHBOARD_NO_TITLE.description: Notification text when the user didn't chose a name for the signal
